attributes.action: Extend/restart the underground metropolitan line until Aylesbury/Aylesbury vale
attributes.additional_details:
It seems Aylesbury already has an ununsed underground metropolitan line / train station.
 http://www.disused-stations.org.uk/a/aylesbury/
attributes.background: Aylesbury is developing swiftly with a lot of new developments and young home purchasers choosing Aylesbury as their new home . Currently the only way to commute out of aylesbury by train is by the national railway line , which has exorbitant charges.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of TFL who are accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
